content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity Generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace(position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0)

### Lab at position(x= unknown)
Consists of a lab connected to power source with ElectricityGroup(id=6111)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extract but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when trying to insert items into a full inventory
- Check if the inventory is full before attempting to insert items

### Errors when trying to extract items from an empty inventory
- Check if the inventory is empty before attempting to extract items

### Errors when trying to connect entities
- Ensure that the entities are compatible and that the connection points are valid before attempting to connect

### Errors when trying to set a recipe for an entity
- Ensure that the entity is a valid type and that the recipe is valid before attempting to set the recipe

### Errors when trying to get an entity at a specific position
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it

### Errors when trying to insert items into a furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel and that the items are valid before attempting to insert them

### Errors when trying to extract items from a burner mining drill
- Ensure that the burner mining drill is working and that the items are valid before attempting to extract them

### Errors when not enough items in inventory
- Ensure that you have enough items in your inventory before attempting to use them

### Errors when not enough automation science packs in inventory
- Ensure that you have enough automation science packs in your inventory before attempting to use them

### Errors when offshore pump and boiler are not connected
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler are connected before attempting to use them

### Errors when burner mining drill has no output sink
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has a valid output sink before attempting to use it
